          <title>
            <string language="nl">Europese Commissie : Ondernemen en industrie</string>
          </title>
          <language>nl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="nl">Engelstalige thematische videoclips over Europese aangelegenheden: 
economisch &ndash; welvaart &ndash; innovatie &ndash; jobs &ndash; technologie &ndash; mijnen &ndash; metalen &ndash; pharmaceutica &ndash; ondernemingen &ndash; toerisme -  ... 

Growth and jobs, Industrial competitiveness, Single market for goods: The machinery directive contributes to the competitiveness of the European machinery sector.
Small and medium sized enterprises (SME): An entrepreneur finds support for her ideas from the Enterprise Europe Network, the world's largest network connecting business to Europe.
Small and medium sized enterprises (SME): A multilingual practical information and online government service for companies looking for business in another EU country.
Space: As a major space power, the European Union supports space research with projects on human space flight, robotics space exploration, space transportation and more.
Tourism: Discover Europe's hidden treasures
Small and medium sized enterprises (SME) Learning throught sharing. Erasmus for young entrepreneurs: The European programme for entrepreneurial exchange. 
Security research and development: European Security Research: Making Europe more secure for its citizens.
Better regulation: Cutting red tape: Commission delivers on its promise and goes beyond
Maritime industries: The EU gives a coordinated response to the new competitive challenges of the European shipbuilding sector.
Small and medium sized enterprises (SME): 1st Prize - Entrepreneur vs Employee - © Ducsai SZABOLCS
Sustainable and responsible business: Inspiring young entrepreneurs launch Your World Your Business to promote responsible entrepreneurship
European Standards: Standardisation is an excellent tool to facilitate international trade, competition and the acceptance of innovations by markets.</string>
